description: Try our easy to follow Easy Mushroom Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Savoury pie & tart,Pescatarian,High fibre,High protein,Soy free,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Mushroom,Peanut free
name: Easy Mushroom Tart Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Heat oil in a deep frying pan. Add leek and cook for 5 minutes or until beginning to soften. Add garlic, mushrooms and thyme and cook, stirring occasionally over medium heat for 10 minutes until mushrooms have softened and liquid has evaporated. Season with salt flakes and pepper. Cool.
Mix ricotta, 1/3 cup parmesan, egg and chives in a bowl. Season to taste.

Place a large sheet of baking paper on work surface. Brush each sheet of filo with butter and layer on top of each other. Fold sides of pastry in about 3cm and fold over once more. Brush edges with butter.
Spread ricotta mixture over the inside of pastry and top evenly with cooled mushroom mixture. Scatter remaining parmesan over the top.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until pastry is puffed and golden. Cut into slices and top with rocket leaves.
